Audio.Author: Oscar Humberto Marin-Gomez
Audio.Comments: Ref: OHM005A 1810. Dawn Chorus. Perched in lateral branch in Canopy. Low Montane Forest. 25m distace to Mic. Natural Vocalization.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
